items.title: Sequence 9: Spectator
items.text:
New Abilities

Enhanced Mental Attributes: A Spectator's Body of Heart and Mind would receive great enhancement, mostly on their inferential, analytical, observational, and identification abilities along with their memory.
If an animal drinks this potion, it will gain intelligence and the ability to speak in human language.
When Susie accidentally drank the potion, she started to become more human-like and eventually learned how to speak the human tongue in a couple of days.
Body Language Analysis: Spectators possess keen powers of observation when it comes to observing individuals in either an individual or group sense. 
They can look at a person strictly from a bystander's perspective, discovering their true thoughts from their expressions, their manners, and their subconscious actions.
Through this, they can accurately figure out connections and draw conclusions from the details they gathered to form an accurate mental model of the target.
Enhanced Vision: Upon drinking this potion, a Spectator will also possess the sharpened eyesight needed to analyze a target's body language.
Even though Audrey Hall was in the corner of a ballroom party, she could still accurately notice the subtle movements of other people from afar.

items.title: Sequence 8: Telepathist
items.text:
New Abilities

Mind Reading: Telepathists are able to read the superficial thoughts of others and are also able to simulate the trajectory of such thoughts to a certain degree.
Strengthened Abilities

Body Language Analysis: A Telepathist's observation is not only limited to superficial details, but deeper into one's aura, Ether Body, or other mysterious domains.
They also know what kind of emotional reaction to show in the appropriate situation and know in detail what kind of expression and body language to react with.
Enhanced Vision: Their eyesight has been further enhanced, being much clearer than before.

items.title: Sequence 7: Psychiatrist (Psyche Analyst)
items.text:
Description
On the basis of the Telepathist, they have gone a step further and started to directly affect their target. 
New Abilities

Frenzy: Psychiatrists can trigger the emotions and mental state of their target, throwing the target into a Frenzy, suffering intense psychological damage, and might even cause a direct loss of control at times.
This effects not only one’s Body of Heart and Mind but also targets one's Spirit Body as well.
Telepathy: Through mediums like candlelight and extracts, they can put their target in a partially hypnotic state. From there, they'll be able to directly communicate with their Body of Heart and Mind.
This also allows the Psychiatrist to enter the deepest part of the target’s Soul, or in other words, the bottom of the target’s dreamland. There, a corresponding scene will materialize.
Psychological Cue: Through the use of specific methods, words, and a medium, a Psychiatrist can Cue a target, letting them abide by their arrangements without them even realizing it.
They can also enter the Sea of Collective Subconscious using Psychological Cue on themselves.
They can make a target strongly abide by a particular promise from the bottom of their hearts.
Awe (Dragon's Might, Mass Chaos): Psychiatrists can cause target(s) within a certain range to instantly panic, freeze, and turn chaotic, as though they’re facing a dragon.
This can be resisted against if the corresponding target possesses a strong mental resistance or knows in advance that the attack is coming.
Placate (Psychoanalysis): Psychiatrists can help Beyonders or mortals on the brink of losing control and becoming unstable regain their reason and escape danger.
The higher their Sequence compares to their "patients", the more easily Placate will succeed.
Psychiatrists are also able to use Psychoanalysis in 2 other ways:
They can calm down various psychological instabilities and allow for communication.
They can awaken a feeling and memory, causing an unstable target to be Placated.
Physical Enhancements: Psychiatrists will experience a slight increase in their physical attributes. This is no longer just limited to their eyesight.
Their strength and speed have become much stronger than before, while their enhanced eyesight will allow them to clearly see in the dark. They are also more healthy.
Their sense of smell is able to distinguish even more subtle smells, thus allowing them to grasp a target’s truest emotions and thoughts.
Strengthened Abilities

Body Language Analysis: Their analysis of a person can now be done indirectly.
A Psychiatrist can now analyze someone's body language in a picture to figure out their true emotions and thoughts, allowing them to form an effective mental model for the target.

items.title: Sequence 6: Hypnotist
items.text:
New Abilities
Psychological Invisibility: With a Hypnotist's control of their target’s Body of Heart and Mind, they could remain in the blind spot of one’s consciousness, achieving Psychological Invisibility.
This won't change even if the target employs Spirit Vision. Even a Hunter's Danger Intuition will not react until the user is prepared to strike. By comparison, a Shadow Ascetic's Shadow Lurking occasionally evokes the sensation of being watched by the darkness.
Psychological Invisibility also prevents the target from perceiving the user, even when the user is standing right before them and numerous others had already witnessed their presence.
In this state, Hypnotists can also carry items such as scented candles and still not be noticed by the target in the darkness; however, this effect will take all of their focus to maintain.
The target will still notice interactions with the surroundings, but the sense of their existence will be eliminated, and they will still be in the target's blind spot.
Once that interaction becomes stronger to the point where the target can't ignore it, the Psychological Invisibility of a Hypnotist will inevitably be broken.
Strengthened Abilities

Hypnosis: Their Psychological Cue ability would undergo a qualitative change, becoming Hypnosis.
Non-Combat Hypnosis: Hypnotists can open the door and enter their target's Body of Heart and Mind by getting them to concentrate on something, which allowed them to directly alter their target's consciousness and subconscious.
If the suggestion directly harms their life, the things they most value in its subconscious, or if the target had a strong Soul and a firm body and mind, they can resist to a certain extent.
In this way, the target wouldn’t notice that they were abiding by the Hypnotist's arrangements, nor realize they were taking actions that didn’t align with their true intentions.
Battle Hypnotism: Besides Non-Combat Hypnosis, they could just forcefully Hypnotize an enemy, making their enemies do something abnormal, such as Hypnotizing them to attack their companions or avoid them.
Similar to Non-combat Hypnosis, Battle Hypnotism is unable to harm the target’s life or make the enemy directly commit suicide.
Such Battle Hypnotism could only last for short periods of time, and the target would quickly snap awake and sense the problem.
Physical Enhancement: Be it their strength or agility, it would exceed an ordinary person’s.
Dragon Scales: Besides their physical enhancements, Hypnotists could also form a layer of Dragon Scales over their skin, allowing them to largely resist and reduce any physical damage.

items.title: Sequence 5: Dreamwalker
items.text:
New Abilities
Alteration: Dreamwalkers can modify their target's Dreams, influencing them over a long period of time and making them do things that they usually wouldn't do without them realizing it.
The principle behind Alteration, is to use a dream as the incisive point and the Astral Projection as a point of leverage, slowing and contaminating the target’s Spirit Body before affecting the Body of Heart and Mind, planting it deep in the subconscious.
Most scenarios involving love at first sight may include some hidden cases where it's a result of Alteration, where a person might have a Dream about an individual and spend romantic time with them. When they finally meet in real life, it won't take long before that love blossoms.
Compared to Hypnosis, Alteration is more mild and furtive, making it difficult to be noticed and suitable for targeting targets at a higher level. This control is so mild that it can be done to even Demigods with sufficient preparations.
Guidance: While perceiving the target's Dreams, a Dreamwalker could cause different changes within it, Guiding their target into subtly revealing their deepest secrets.
This ability is similar to a Nightmare. The difference was that a Nightmare could forcefully pull a person into a Dream. However, Dreamwalkers weren’t capable of doing so unless they combined Guidance with Hypnosis to make the target enter a dream-like state.
Dream Traversal: Their physical and Spirit Body would turn incorporeal, allowing them to not only directly hide in someone else’s dream but to also jump from one dream to another.
The restriction on a Dreamwalker's Dream Traversal was that the distance between two dreams couldn’t exceed 500 meters, and they had to belong to intelligent creatures.

items.title: Sequence 4: Manipulator
items.text:
New Abilities
Manipulation: Their Body of Heart and Mind can pass through the Sea of Collective Subconscious and enter another person’s Mind Island, allowing them to directly change the target's subconscious and read their thoughts, silently Manipulating them to do all sorts of things.
Manipulators can bury psychological hints deep inside the target's Mind Island. From there onwards, their victims will orderly and accurately attempt to carry the hint out.
They can manipulate groups of people like this, as if it were a mass mind control.
Even after recovering, most victims will not realize they were manipulated.
Mental Plague: They can secretly implant seeds of Mental Plague in the target’s Mind Island, which would quietly infect the surrounding Sea of Collective Subconscious, forming an environment of "contagious mental diseases" without anyone within the area noticing.
This causes countless mental illnesses and extreme madness. Moreover, the madness and mental illnesses from a Mental Plague can also be transmitted through Spirit Body Threads.
Since Mental Plagues originate within oneself, it cannot be isolated by the blessings of an Angel. At best, the Mental Plague will be weakened, and their onset will be delayed.
This belongs to the erosion and infection of the Mind Island and the Spirit World, it's not a direct attack, and it's difficult to offset it by a Virtual Persona.
Virtual Persona: They can create up to 13 Virtual Personas (at the start) that have a corresponding Body of Heart and Mind. In this way, they can defend from a lot of influence in the Mind Domain and invade another person's Mind Island without any signs.
Hermes used "His" Virtual Personas to elevate Klein Moretti's Mind Island, suppressing his consciousness to fight back and make him unable to take multiple things into consideration.
Mind Storm: They can transform their designated thoughts into a Mind Storm and sweep the surroundings, which would affect the surrounding Sea of Collective Subconscious, causing all sorts of negative effects to those within its range.
It can cause the surrounding creatures to hear thousands of voices whose words contained corrupting knowledge, causing them to have a higher chance at losing control.
This Mind Storm will hit the enemy's Mind Island continuously, causing the target(s)' Spirituality to be strongly disturbed, effectively destroying their mind barrier.
Strengthened Abilities
Mind Deprivation: A qualitative change in Awe causes it to become Mind Deprivation. When activated, all creatures within its range will inevitably experience all sorts of abnormal conditions.
Among such abnormal conditions include the following:
Varying degrees of losing control as their knees would buckle as they slumped to the ground.
Showing their fervent expressions and crowding around the Manipulator like attendants.
Standing rooted to the ground in a daze or attempting to blindly escape the area.
Some victims would even faint immediately and fall into a coma.
Psychological Invisibility: Its potency has been enhanced, allowing them to evade the perception of most Demigods, so long as they don't directly come into their field of view.
Hvin Rambis was able to hide from Klein Moretti using Psychological Invisibility.
Mind Dragon Breath: This Beyonder power that stems from their Mythical Creature Form as Mind Dragons is the upgraded version of Frenzy.
It is an attack that can directly stimulate and harm the target's Body of Heart and Mind. It deals damage in an area-of-effect manner.
Consciousness Stroll: A Manipulator's Dream Traversal ability has evolved when it comes to its scope, becoming Consciousness Stroll.
It allows their consciousness and their Spirit Body to easily swim and wander in the Sea of Collective Subconscious; however, they cannot bring their physical body into it.
They still have to use Dreams to traverse around areas.
Physical Enhancement: As Demigods, their physical attributes are strengthened greatly.
They possess extraordinary strength and exaggerated dragon scale defenses, enough break through a block of steel with one punch and run faster than a steam train.
Hypnosis: Their Combat Hypnosis ability have been enhanced.
Battle Hypnotism: Their Combat Hypnosis allows them to interfere with the thoughts passed through Spirit Body Threads. It is closer to the interference of will than the Hypnosis of the mind.
This is something that requires a deep-delve in their powers to figure out.
Mythical Creature Form
As Sequence 4 Demigods they receive some level of Godhood, and with it comes an incomplete Mythical Creature Form. Disregarding all consequences, they can release their incomplete Mythical Creature Form to become an incomplete Mind Dragon.
Their incomplete Mythical Creature Form looks like a Mind Dragon that has yet to fully evolve. Their head remains in the form of a human and their back is covered in gray-skinned wings. Their limbs and thick and the grayish-white Dragon Scales they possess will be engraved with complicated three-dimensional, mysterious symbols that extends into the flesh and out to the void. It appears that these symbols are a mesh of objects that didn’t belong to the real world.
Anyone who laid their eyes upon their incomplete Mythical Creature Form would suffer a form of mental confusion as their thoughts warped. Even one’s Spirit Body would be tainted with all kinds of thoughts that came from deep within one’s heart, eager to rip apart themselves.
When in this incomplete Mythical Creature Form, they gain the strength and defense of dragons. Although they would be strong in melee combat, they still lack the necessary, powerful offensive Beyonder powers that make them excel in it.
Through the use of Psychoanalysis and Hypnosis, a newly advanced Manipulator will be able to manifest and maintain full control over their incomplete Mythical Creature Form for about 1 minute before they suffer negative effects.

items.title: Sequence 3: Dream Weaver
items.text:
New Abilities 
Dream Weaving: Dream Weavers can Weave out objects, persons, and scenes within a Dream that are indistinguishable from reality making the target not even realize that they are in a Dream.
If the target believes the Weaved scenes, objects, or persons are real, then they are real to the target. Although these Weaved images don't cause physical manifestations when they attacked, it can make the target to die from fright or other mental reasons.
Pauli Derlau attempted to create the Weaved images of Hermes and Adam to trick Klein Moretti into thinking those persons were real so he can use them for attacks.
Strengthened Abilities
Plague Storm: Through Mind Deprivation and Mental Plague, they can release a storm of thoughts, desires, and wills that affects everyone caught within it in half-illusory and real ways.
Within a Dream Weaver's Plague Storm, every affected and eroded creature will experience Corruption and go crazy on the spot.
For Angels, this kind of attack is the most dangerous, because "Their" mental state has certain problems, and "They" may lose control because of the tilt of the balance at any time.
Enhanced Mental Attributes: With a control over their psyche and spirit, an enemy's intuition can't form a picture in their mind, and it is difficult for others to predict their own behavior.
This made Klein’s Danger Intuition not able to form an image in his mind, making it difficult for Klein to predict the Visionary Pathway Saint's actions.
Psychological Invisibility: They can create a mental mirage in a target's mind to mask their existence.
This application of Psychological Invisibility is so realistic that it could even fool Demigods who specialize in Spiritual Intuition and the discernment of various illusions.
Consciousness Stroll: The limitations regarding this ability have lessened.
In addition to their consciousness and Spirit Body, they can now let their physical body enter the Sea of Collective Subconscious, achieving a form of Teleportation in the process.
Dream Weavers are now able to just observe the movement of the Sea of Collective Subconscious around them, and through it, obtain insight into the truest thoughts of others.
Virtual Persona: What was now just virtual can become real.
They can separate their fake personalities or previous identities and turn them into living people. Even if these identities die it will not harm their true bodies.
The living people created from their Virtual Persona can fully interact with the environment and manage things independent from the main body.
Mythical Creature Form
The incomplete Mythical Creature Form a Dream Weaver exhibits develops further; there is a certain change in their head, making it closer to a lizard and not a human. In addition to that, their pupils as a Mind Dragon had become golden and vertical while their Dragon Scales that had become intertwined with mysterious patterns that make it cold and warped.

items.title: Sequence 2: Discerner
items.text:
Description

"Discernment" is the foundation of description, interference, arrangement, and Imagination. Knowing oneself and the enemy ensures victory in every battle.

New Abilities
Dream Maze: "They" are able to create a Dream Maze made up of the Mind Islands of many people. Inside will be doors that lead to the deepest part of someone's mind, where their secrets are kept.
This Dream Maze a Discerner can create can act as a labyrinth that subjects the minds inside to mental and spiritual interrogation, confusion, and disturbances.
Should there be Corruption inside the Dream Maze, it will affect the minds of all the people who made up the Dream Maze, leading to  loss in control.
Authorities
Discernment: "They" can Discern the hidden psychological vulnerabilities of a target, identifying their deepest fears. The Discerner can also preliminarily perceive the target's past Destinies and the resulting causal connections that resulted from them.
Discernment can sometimes penetrate the cover of Concealment, and sometimes be blocked by Concealment, and the two restrain each other.
The same is true when "Their" Discernment faces Deceit, Fooling, and other similar abilities, sometimes penetrating through and sometimes being blocked.
Normal Anti-Divination and Anti-Prophecy methods are not able to protect it's contents from the Discerner due to Discernment.
Psychological Cue: It has been elevated to the level of an authority. If "They" believe "Themselves" to be powerful enough, "They" will be, unconstrained by external appearance or physical condition.
This authority is essentially pure idealism — like in a shōnen manga, where a character can suddenly unleash hidden power simply by believing in it.
If "They" have sufficient understanding of Outer Deities and "Their" symbolism (which only  Outer Deity reincarnations can fully understand), "They" can briefly enter that level through idealism but will inevitably be assimilated afterwards, becoming a part in the corresponding entity.
This could allow the Primordial God Almighty Resurrected  in an Angel to temporarily achieve this level, but "He" would only have the time to quickly kill one True Deity.
"They" don't necessarily have to reach the corresponding level, but "They" must have truly witnessed such powerful performances and understood the corresponding knowledge. Otherwise, "They" can't even imagine it.
If the Discerner were to fully understand a Sequence 1 Angel or True Deity, "They" would be able to temporarily elevate "Their" rank to that level.
Elevating to the level of a True God means that "They" will be assimilated, becoming a part in the corresponding entity. This is a risk that stems from the symbolism.
If there is a Visionary, the Discerner won't be able to reach the level of a True Deity since it will conflict with the Visionary's Uniqueness.
Examples of this authority in use are:
Despite being turned into a rabbit through the Transfiguration Curse, Hermes's belief could make "Him" become the size of half a mountain through self-belief.
Strengthened Abilities
Dream Weaving: "Their" ability of Dream Weaving has been massively enhanced in 2 ways:
The effects of "Their" Weaving will even more affect the person in reality. Turning the target crazy, becoming a monster, or changing their personality are examples of the effects.
A Discerner's Dream Weaving is now able to exit the Mind World and be Weaved into reality, creating a flawless illusion that is hard to discern as being a Weaved image.
Consciousness Stroll: A Discerner has a deeper, more meticulous perception of the Sea of Collective Subconscious, and can truly enter it, navigating its depths.
"They" are able to sense the exchange of the Consciousness in one’s heart with the Sea of ​​Collective Subconscious.
Ariehogg was able to sense the impression Liveseyd left on Audrey while Her Virtual Persona was roaming in the Sea of ​​Collective Subconscious.
Mythical Creature Form
"They" become a complete Mythical Creature, "Their" Mythical Creature Form is that of a Mind Dragon. However, for this Pathway, the Dragon form itself is but a conception of the highest authority, and may shift at any moment with a single thought.
Mind Dragons are able to morph into any Mythical Creature Form and wield the corresponding Beyonder powers. If the enemy believes it to be the real form, it becomes real—but without an enemy, it cannot manifest as reality.
The powers that become real only work against those who believe that they are real.

items.title: Sequence 1: Author (Fairy Tale Author)
items.text:
New Abilities

Dream of Reality: "They" can intertwine Dreams with reality, allowing illusion and substance to coexist and making it difficult for individuals to distinguish between the two.
As a True God, Adam created the Dreamscape Garden of Eden which was the headquarters for the councilors of the Psychology Alchemists.
Coincidence: An Author's preliminary control over the Sea of Collective Subconscious also enables "Them" to have mastery over the power of Coincidence.
"They" can turn seemingly accidental, wondrous phenomena into echoes of the mind and are able to make them appear whenever "They" desire.
Authorities

Envisioning (Fantasy into Reality): At this Sequence, "They" master a portion of the Imagination authority, also known as the Fantasy into Reality authority.
The Imagination authority involves not only the Psyche and the Sea of Collective Subconscious but also touches upon the Astral World. It can temporarily pull certain concepts into reality.
This will transform those concepts into truly existing entities that are capable of inflicting real damage or causing tangible changes.
In the Garden of Eden multiple Mental concept (collectively known as Bestiality) existed as a real 'living' entity that could interfere with the target's Mind if touched.
The higher ups of  the Psychology Alchemists had masks that embodied different emotions that lead to the corresponding changes in the Mind when worn.
The stories "They" write or recite will become reality; the living creatures affected finding it hard to sense "Their" manipulations, believing that their actions were of their own will.
"Their" stories have to be within logical boundaries, but "They" are able to force even the most improbable events to occur with just vague reasonings such as "inexplicable" or "strange".
This effect will heavily increase "Their" Spirituality expenditure and likelihood of detection and cannot be done repeatedly within short periods of time.
The strength of an Author's stories depends on the various factors that influence the story. Involving higher-level beings within "Their" stories will lead to more unpredictability.[?]
The range in which an Author's story can influence living beings is usually limited to a big city like Backlund, with it being difficult for an Author to exceed that range.
Some examples of this particular authority being used are:
With the use of the Quill of Alzuhod, Ince Zangwill orchestrated the various events that allowed him to take Saint Selena's Ashes from the Chanis Gate of Saint Selena Cathedral.
Quill of Alzuhod was able to make a meteor shower arrive on Earth two days early with the meteors "just happening to" land in the forest where Klein Moretti was hiding.
Adam narrated a story where Klein had digested his Marionettist potion and fulfilled his Advancement Ritual, allowing him to advance to become a Demigod.
Discernment: The Author gains preliminary control over the Sea of Collective Subconscious and thus possesses the trait of "Whatever is spoken, shall be known".
Whatever is spoken about "Them" will be known and the more a person knows about "Them", the more "They" will know about that person and everyone they came in contact with.
This makes it more likely for those people to appear in "Their" stories
This awareness is also able to be applied to a name or title.
Adam would immediately know everyone who has spoken "His" name. This effect applied not only to "His" normal name, but also "His" alternative names as well.[?]
If the Twilight Hermit Order is mentioned to the outside world, it will be immediately noticed by Adam and possibly the other members of the organization.
However, this effect can be blocked by certain existences.
Any being of similar level with Concealment abilities can block the effect.
Psyche (Mind): "They" gain partial authority over the Mind.
"They" can dominate the Psyche of every living being, compelling them to act according to "Their" will. Beings who are affected by the Author will hardly notice the influence, believing their actions stem from their own genuine thoughts.

items.title: Sequence 0: Visionary
items.text:
Authorities

Envisioning (Fantasy into Reality): What "They" Imagine will materialize; the Divine Kingdom "They" envision will descend upon the physical world; the futures "They" proclaim will unfold and be reality.
This involves not only the Psyche and cognition but also the Astral World (a realm where concepts and symbols converge). Thus, "They" can separate two Sequence 1 Beyonder Characteristics, replacing them with Imagined counterparts while maintaining "Their" own rank and power.
The true Sequence 1 Beyonder Characteristics "They" had separated can be combined with another identity of the Visionary's or a life form that was Imagined, allowing "Them" to create an Author with complete freedom.
Dragon of Imagination Ankewelt created Dragon of Nightmare Alzuhod from "His" one Author Beyonder Characteristic. Adam was also given one Author Beyonder Characteristic by the Ancient Sun God through this method.
Primordial Demoness took advantage of Primordial God Almighty's mind reviving in "Her" and used Envisoning to create another "Her" with only a single Apocalypse Beyonder Characteristic.
When necessary or in life threatening danger, "They" are able to use a certain method or some mediums to transform these Authors into "Their" true form, acting as "Their" Resurrection plan when things go astray.
Dragon of Imagination Ankewelt could Resurrect on Dragon of Nightmare Alzuhod but failed, "They" later revived in Ariehogg instead.
Ancient Sun God partially Resurrected as Adam, becoming "His" Divinity. "His" humanity, on the other hand, formed the True Creator.
The future that "They" declare will be staged and become reality in the real world.
Ancient Sun God declared that Antigonus's future advancement to Fool would ultimately fail due to various reasons. This declared future then became reality.
"They" can Imagine "Their" Divine Kingdom to descend upon the physical world.
Every Divine Kingdom of a Visionary is unique according to “Their” own Imagination and thus possesses a variety of different purposes and abilities.
Corpse Cathedral: It’s a large holy cathedral made out of the bones of different races that forms a space where one's connection to the Spirit and Astral World is blocked.
It also boasts considerable defensive properties, possessing enough defense to be able to resist the destructive power of a True God.
City of Miracles, Liveseyd: It is a floating continent where the Dragon Race lived. Its core is the Hall of Truth, where the Dragon of Imagination Ankewelt resided.
However, the Hall of Truth's purpose changed to Seal the Dragon of Imagination Ankewelt's negative personality Corrupted by the Chaos Sea.
As long as "They" possess sufficient understanding and mastery of relevant concepts, "They" can be, in a sense, Omnipotent. However, such Omnipotence cannot resist authorities that erase Illusions or pierce through Fantasies.
Psyche (Mind): As the master of the Mind World (which includes individual Mind Islands and the Sea of Collective Subconscious), the Visionary holds dominion over all mental realms.
“They” can regress a being's mind to a fetal state, stripping all memories—even subconscious ones—while awakening the full depth of a target's cognition buried within their Soul and mind.
Humanity: Humanity is both good and evil, rational and mad. Humanity arises naturally but can also be manufactured artificially by the Visionary.
Adam had given one of Klein Moretti's Marionettes a unique sense of Humanity that was not able to be discovered by Klein Moretti.
This Marionette, who became a Gehrman Sparrow that wanted rest and freedom, stabbed Klein's heart with a stake that Sealed all of "His" Beyonder powers.
Discernment: As the The Ruler of The Mind World, the Visionary can also be, in a sense, Omniscient, but this effect is limited to matters related to the Mind World.
"Their" Discernment can also extend into the Fate, Reality, and Illusion Domains.
Dream: "They" hold some Dream authority- the concept of Dreams itself.
Loss of Control: "They" hold partial authority over Loss of Control.
For Beyonders, the collapse of one’s Psyche often marks the beginning of Loss of Control.
